title: Bitcoin Risk-Reward Calculation is Being Upended by Rising Rates - Yahoo Finance
content: Bitcoin Risk-Reward Calculation is Being Upended by Rising Rates  Yahoo Finance
description: (Bloomberg) -- A funny thing happened to Bitcoin as interest rates started to rise: trading volumes went way down.
